name: Avid Audio eXtension Plugin File
summary: Learn about .AAXPLUGIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AAXPLUGIN files can be created by Avid as well as third-party developers to add functionality to Pro Tools.
In Windows, the plugins are located in the following directory:
In Mac OS X, the plugins are located in the following directory:

description: Avid Audio eXtension (AAX) plugin format used by Pro Tools, a digital audio workstation (DAW); adds extra sound processing and audio effects to the application; examples include vintage compressor emulations, convolution reverbs, and noise reduction tools.
